thread.title: Richard Linklater, Robert Downey Jr. Team Up for Real-Life Con Man Feature | Hollywood Reporter
thread.title_full: Richard Linklater, Robert Downey Jr. Team Up for Real-Life Con Man Feature | Hollywood Reporter

author: Mia Galuppo
title: Richard Linklater, Robert Downey Jr. Team Up for Real-Life Con Man Feature | Hollywood Reporter
text:
Sign up for our Newsletters . Daily Edition Richard Linklater, Robert Downey Jr. Team Up for Real-Life Con Man Feature 6:54 PM PST 2/13/2017 by Mia Galuppo Getty Images Annapurna Pictures has partnered with Susan and Robert Downey Jr.’s Team Downey for the untitled feature. 
Richard Linklater will direct Robert Downey Jr. in a real-life con man story. 
Annapurna Pictures has partnered with Susan and Robert Downey Jr.’s Team Downey for the untitled feature, which is based on the episode “Man of the People” from Gimlet Media’s Reply All podcast. 
The podcast tells the true story of Dr. John Brinkley, who scammed his way to fame and fortune using fake medicine, populism and the newest technology of the time: radio. Linklater will co-produce under his Detour Filmproduction banner, along with Gimlet Media’s PJ Vogt, Tim Howard, and Chris Giliberti. More to come.
